sentences.en: A third form of weave is the satin weave.
sentences.cn: 第三种织造形式是缎纹组织.

sentences.en: Batiste is a cotton fabric with a fine weave.
sentences.cn: 薄织的麻布是一种细密地编织成的棉织布.

sentences.en: Complexity is related to surface irregularities, surface texture, fuzziness, and weave.
sentences.cn: 至于复杂性与表面的不规则性, 表面结构, 毛羽程度和织造加工有关.

sentences.en: cyclists weaving in and out of the traffic
sentences.cn: 在车流中穿进穿出的骑车人

sentences.en: Fabrics with a close weave are ideal for painting.
sentences.cn: 编织紧密的布最适合作画。

sentences.en: Homespun is a cloth of coarse weave.
sentences.cn: 土布是一种织得粗糙的布.

sentences.en: I had to dodge and weave to avoid her kisses.
sentences.cn: 为了躲开她的亲吻,我不得不闪避或绕道走.

sentences.en: I will sit at my loom and weave the web.
sentences.cn: 我每天都坐在织布机旁边织这块布.

sentences.en: In one room, young mothers weave while babies doze in their laps.
sentences.cn: 在一间屋子里，年轻的母亲们在织布，而她们的孩子就在她们膝上打盹。

sentences.en: Only a few of the women still weave.
sentences.cn: 只有数量很少的妇女还在编织。

sentences.en: People weave thread into cloth, straw into hats, and reeds into baskets.
sentences.cn: 人们把线织成布, 把草编成草帽, 把芦苇编成篮子.
拿佛和人编织美丽的地毯.

sentences.en: They weave a basket out of osiers with pliant young willows.
sentences.cn: 他们用易弯的柳枝编制篮子。

sentences.en: They weave in and out of traffic, and they pass on the right.
sentences.cn: 他们在通行时进出摇晃, 他们从右面超过.

sentences.en: They would spin and weave cloth, cook and attend to the domestic side of life.
sentences.cn: 她们纺纱、织布、煮饭以及料理家务。

sentences.en: Weave all pieces on the same loom.

words.tran_cn: 编织；交织（weave的过去分词）；编造

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)轻快地开始工作；开始行动
斜纹组织；斜纹织；斜织法

trans.tran_en: the way in which a material is woven, and the pattern formed by this
to make cloth, a carpet, a basket etc by crossing threads or thin pieces under and over each other by hand or on a loom
to make cloth, a carpet, a basket etc by crossing threads or thin pieces under and over each other by hand or on a loom
to make cloth, a carpet, a basket etc by crossing threads or thin pieces under and over each other by hand or on a loom
